description: This is the main entry point for a Flutter application called 'Budget Tracker Pro'. It includes application initialization, theming, state management setup with Provider, and a home screen with tabbed navigation. The file also manages environment variables and a mock mode indicator.

classes.name: _Home
classes.description: StatefulWidget representing the home screen with bottom navigation tabs.

classes.name: _HomeState
classes.description: State class managing tab index and page views for the home screen.

classes.name: _SettingsScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays user info, environment details, and logout options.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the respective widget (_Home, _SettingsScreen).

search-terms: Tabs: Dashboard, Transactions, Budgets, Goals, Alerts
